text: and your sin that you had committed, that is, the calf I took, and burned it with fire, and breaking it into pieces. Until it was as small as dust, I threw it into the torrent, which cometh down from the mount.

segments.text: and your sin that you had committed, that is, the calf I took, and burned it with fire,
and breaking it into pieces. Until it was as small as dust, I threw it into the torrent,
which cometh down from the mount.
